criticalRules.neverMarkCompleteWithoutVerification: User must confirm functionality works before marking tickets as completed
criticalRules.alwaysTestImplementation: Test all implementations before claiming completion
criticalRules.alwaysCheckESLintErrors: Always run linting checks before marking work complete - avoid unescaped entities and other common ESLint errors
criticalRules.preventCommonErrors: Avoid apostrophes in JSX text, use proper escaping or ' entity
criticalRules.useDockerForTesting: Always use Docker commands for testing to isolate dev environment from user's machine. Use npm run docker:dev, npm run docker:logs, npm run docker:shell commands. App available at https://flow-stage.localtest.me
